dependencies.description: The PyPA recommended tool for installing Python packages.
dependencies.name: py-pip

dependencies.description:
A Python utility that aids in the process of downloading, building,
upgrading, installing, and uninstalling Python packages.
dependencies.name: py-setuptools

dependencies.description: A Spack managed Python virtual environment
dependencies.name: python-venv

dependent_to.description:
CallFlow is an interactive visual analysis tool that provides a high-
level overview of CCTs together with semantic refinement operations to
progressively explore the CCTs.
dependent_to.name: callflow

dependent_to.description:
CEKit is a Container image creation tool. CEKit helps to build container
images from image definition files with strong focus on modularity and
code reuse.
dependent_to.name: py-cekit

dependent_to.description:
Gcovr provides a utility for managing the use of the GNU gcov utility
and generating summarized code coverage results. This command is
inspired by the Python coverage.py package, which provides a similar
utility for Python.
dependent_to.name: py-gcovr

dependent_to.description:
Optuna is an automatic hyperparameter optimization software framework,
particularly designed for machine learning. It features an imperative,
define-by-run style user API. Thanks to our define-by-run API, the code
written with Optuna enjoys high modularity, and the user of Optuna can
dynamically construct the search spaces for the hyperparameters.
dependent_to.name: py-optuna

dependent_to.description: Import, export, process, analyze and view triangular meshes
dependent_to.name: py-trimesh

dependent_to.description: scalable pythonic model fitting for high energy physics
dependent_to.name: py-zfit

description: A colored formatter for the python logging module
name: py-colorlog

variants.description: Build systems supported by the package
variants.name: build_system
